title: Flipped Learning-Based Programming Laboratory Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational programming syntax and algorithm comprehension, with experience using math education software tools
context.additional_context: Developing mathematics teaching methods using programming practice environments for pre-service teachers.

learning_goals: Students can solve programming-based mathematics problems with 80% or higher accuracy through a tiered task hierarchy model.
Students apply peer feedback and self-reflection three or more times when performing experimental tasks in a flipped learning environment.
Students demonstrate programming-based mathematics education competencies by achieving an average score of 85 or higher in online practical assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
